title: vaNNa mayil mElE
sahitya:
vaNNa mayil mElE vandiDum murugA tiruvAnmiyUr kuDi koNDa tirumAlOn marugA


anupallavi

  puNNaiyar pOTruginra porppAr vaDivElA pUvaiyar iruvar tammai porundum oru shiIlA


caraNam    vanni virukSam adu vaLarum oru talattavA valminai tanai nIkki nal vAzhvaruL kalattavA
annai shivashakti aNaittu magizh pudalvA aDiyar sukham anaittum aLittaruLvAi murugA
